2077230.name: Circle of Orion
2077230.description:
Embark on an extraordinary journey into the world of ORIONIS. In a grand fantasy RPG, 39-year-old Ellen and her teenage son Leo find themselves unexpectedly transported to a mystic realm, where their bond will be tested and the world hangs in the balance. Meet a varied cast of characters, face formidable creatures, traverse a sprawling overworld, and delve deep into an adventure that pays homage to 6th-generation console RPGs.

A Fantastical Journey Awaits:

Immerse yourself in the world of Orionis, a realm brimming with wonder and magic. From sprawling cities to mystic forests and treacherous dungeons, every corner of the world is ripe with unique cultures, captivating lore, and countless secrets waiting to be unearthed.

Dynamic Turn-Based Combat:

Engage in exhilarating battles where strategy and positioning are paramount. Utilize powerful spells and abilities, carefully planning your moves and exploiting the weaknesses of your adversaries.

Build your Team of Heroes:

Assemble a diverse party of fighters, each with their own distinct abilities, personalities, and stories. Unleash the true potential of your characters through a versatile grimoire magic system, allowing you to customize and enhance their skills as you see fit.
